I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie, like going to the theater or whatever.
I was too tired, sure. This night shift has just been killing me on rest. The thing that happened is this....we still don't know if Batman has any powers but guess what kind of weapon he has? Just one......a simple gun

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was repelled by this version of the fable : parody or adoration ?
To be honest I think there’s a pratical goal ! This movie will bring the Hello Kitty participants found on Steam and Grin. But this time… who

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since fled Planet Earth, for with enough money one could emigrate to Orbitals above where there seems to be plenty of dishnow meat for sale. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to score big points with martial arts aficionados has just about every martial arts technique and move that one can name is used in it, and with over three hours combined screen time of Pele-Mountain-Pummeling-Fistfights; this is one you’ll really get
